mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, TYPE ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, EMAIL, NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regdate, IMAGE_PATH FROM MEMBER ORDER BY regdate DESC
SELECT ID, EMAIL, NAME, TYPE, IMAGE_PATH FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND STATUS = 'enabled'
SELECT ID, EMAIL, NAME, TYPE, IMAGE_PATH FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password} AND STATUS = 'enabled'
SELECT ID, EMAIL, NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regdate, IMAGE_PATH FROM MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}

WITH RECURSIVE month_list AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL seq - 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS month FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS seq FROM (SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10) t1, (SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10) t2, (SELECT @rownum := 0) r ) seqs LIMIT 12 ) SELECT ml.month, COUNT(m.regdate) AS memberCount FROM month_list ml LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON DATE_FORMAT(m.regdate, '%Y-%m') = ml.month AND m.TYPE = 'guest' AND m.STATUS = 'enabled' GROUP BY ml.month ORDER BY ml.month;
SELECT GENDER AS gender, COUNT(*) AS count FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'enabled' AND TYPE = 'guest' GROUP BY GENDER
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM MEMBER WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND CURDATE()
SELECT NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, IMAGE_PATH FROM MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'disabled' WHERE ID = #{id}
